info.description:
Hikikomori
==========

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/hikikomori.svg
   :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/hikikomori
   :alt: The latest PyPI release

Hikikomori is transmission_ based torrent_ automation tool.
You can download Anime_ from NyaaTorrents_ by transmission_ automatically.

.. _transmission: https://www.transmissionbt.com/
.. _torrent: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BitTorrent
.. _Anime: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anime
.. _NyaaTorrents: http://www.nyaa.se/


Requirements
------------

You **must** install ``Python 3.4`` or higher and
``transmission-daemon`` before install.


Install
-------

It's simple. Try it.

.. code-block:: console

   $ pip3.4 install hikikomori

.. note::

   I recommand use virtualenv_ because it use various libraries and
   frameworks. It can cause `Dependency hell`_. You can solve it by
   virtualenv_ and use it simply by virtualenvwrapper_.

.. _virtualenv: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/virtualenv/12.0.5
.. _Dependency hell: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dependency_hell
.. _virtualenvwrapper: https://virtualenvwrapper.readthedocs.org/en/latest/


Why its name is `hikikomori`?
-----------------------------

I think this daemon run at users home and never go out and always needs Anime
and download it. This image look like hikikomori_. So I named it. (lol)

.. _hikikomori: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hikikomori


License
-------

MIT
